protonmail.name: ProtonMail
use_cases: Best for people who want an ecosystem since it includes cloud storage, calendar, VPN, and more
Best for power users who want PGP support so non-Proton users can initiate secure conversations with you
pros: Includes a calendar, cloud storage, password manager, and VPN with all plans
cons: No desktop app, web or third-party email client only.

tuta.name: Tuta
use_cases: Best for users who desire maximum security with their email since Tuta encrypts things above beyond standard PGP
pros: Includes a calendar with all plans
